original_text: And every grain offering baked in the oven and all that is prepared on a pan or a griddle shall belong to the priest who offers it.
korean_text: 화덕에 구운 소제물과 냄비에나 철판에서 만든 소제물은 모두 그 드린 제사장에게로 돌아갈 것이니

sentences.original_text: And every grain offering baked in the oven
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 화덕에서 구운 모든 곡식 제물은

sentences.original_text: and all that is prepared on a pan or a griddle
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 번철이나 철판에 준비된 모든 것은

sentences.original_text: shall belong to the priest who offers it
